downloadingAlert.content_01: Data downloading of the Topographic Map of Catalonia is needed to be able to work in areas with poor coverage.
downloadingAlert.content_02: If you don't want to download the data now, you can continue navigating with an online version, and you will be prompted to download them afterwards.
downloadingAlert.content_03: Download now the Topographic Map of Catalonia? (350 MB)
